title: Der zweite Post
text:
Note



Note that there are five types of callouts, including: note, warning, important, tip, and caution.








Tip With Caption



This is an example of a callout with a caption.








Expand To Learn About Collapse





This is an example of a ‘folded’ caution callout that can be expanded by the user. You can use collapse="true" to collapse it by default or collapse="false" to make a collapsible callout that is expanded by default.

title: Tools
text:
Programmming
For scientific and technical writing I produce most of the time my documents and presentations with \(\LaTeX\) and if I need some dynmaic content (e.g. teaching programming) I currently prefer Quarto

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: Publications
text:
References

Arora, Cervical spine and muscle adaptation after spaceflight and relationship to herniation risk: Protocol from “cervical in space” trial, BMC Musculoskeletal Disorders. 23 (2022). https://doi.org/10.1186/s12891-022-05684-0.

title: Dr. Braunstein
text:
Contact me preferably via email. If this do not work for you try to get me on the phone in my office or show up in the lab or office during ‘normal academic hours’.
Institute of Biomechanics and Orthopaedics
Institute of Movement and Neuroscience

Am Sportpark Müngersdorf 6
50933 Cologne
Germany
 braunstein@dshs-koeln.de
+49(221)4982.5621
Building: NaWiMedi
Room: xxxx
